attributes.action: Abolish the BBC Licence Fee – End Biased Broadcasting at Public Expense
attributes.additional_details: The BBC is increasingly seen as politically biased, especially in its international coverage. Combined with rising fees and the removal of free licences for pensioners, many feel forced to pay for content they don’t trust or want. The public deserves a neutral, accountable broadcaster, funded fairly in a modern media environment.
attributes.background: Abolish the BBC licence fee and demand reform of its funding and editorial standards. The BBC must stop biased reporting and return to its duty of impartial, fair public broadcasting in a way that reflects today’s media landscape.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Revoke the BBC's royal charter & right to charge a licence fee
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711434
